page.title: 01General Page
page.content: Harborne is three miles from Birmingham City Centre & straddles the outer circle bus route. The High St.is a moderately large shopping centre with a full range of shops, banks, building societies & restaurants. Housing ranges from the very expensive detached houses to terraces, many of which have been renovated & modernised in the private sector. Council houses are built in estates with some tower blocks. To the S.W. of Harborne is Woodgate Valley Country Park, a large open area designated a park in 1984, which is flanked to the north by the large mixed housing estate of Quinton & to the south by the newer development of Woodgate Valley. The large pre-war housing estate of Weoley Castle lies to the S.E. of the park & is flanked by Lodge Hill Crematorium.
